A taijutsu technique where the user smashes their elbow into their opponent using the other arm as support. It deals a powerful blow to the target and as the name suggests, it was even strong enough to destroy [[Yagura]]'s [[Coral Palm|coral]].<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 567, page 6</ref>

== Trivia ==
* In its first debut in the anime, Guy does not slam his elbow into the enemy. Instead, he performs a whirling-like motion when attacking his enemy.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 250</ref> This was corrected in a later episode.<ref>''Naruto: Shippūden'' episode 326</ref>
